channel.title: DyNamic's 639
channel.description:
[URL=http://"http://www.dynamicpvp.com/play"]WEBCLIENT[/URL]
[URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/prw40gt4ztaysyc/DyNamic%27s.jar"]DOWNLOAD[/URL]
[URL=http://"http://www.dynamicpvp.com/forums"]FORUMS[/URL]
[URL=http://"http://www.dynamicpvp.com/highscores"]HIGHSCORES[/URL]
Here at DyNamicPvP, we strive to become Superior, the Best. Our dedicated programmer(s) spend many hours a day fixing bugs and adding many fresh new contents onto the server to not only improve it and satisfy our fellow players but to improve the job they perform upon DyNamicPvP. We are a non-profit organization, meaning 100% of our donations are Never for personal use. Most servers are created only to make money for personal use or RSGP profits on Runescape, but not here. All donations are stored to pay-off for our powerful dedicated servers and website, and the rest is saved topay for advertisements and upgrade our dedicated servers. Our server has been revamped months ago and we've lost nearly all players. As of now, our population's increasing little by little which is why we're pleading if you'd please join and help expand our fresh community. As we're striving, we fully understand they're a full-load of servers out here, so many to choose from so now the question is; Why would you join DyNamicPvP? What makes DyNamicPvP stand out than other servers?
Current DyNamicPvP Server Features:
- Functional Webclient and Downloadable Client! - Excellent Economy & All duping methods has been patched! - Unique Home location/Pvp'ing portals at home! - Perfect Item switches for those Pk'ers. - Many Bugs fixed. They're always bugs, no matter how much has been patched. - Every Skill & Skillcape emotes completely functional! - Custom Pk'ing skill & Pk'ing cape along with a functional Skillcape Emote! - Dungeoneering trainable up to 120 & Obtainable Master Cape. - All Curse prayers fully functioning; Protect item, Saps, leeches, deflects, berserker, turmoil & Soulsplit.(Excluding Wrath) - Daily Server Updates. - Completely Lag-free! - Active & Knowledgable staffing team. - Functional Summoning Skill. - Functional Summoning Familiars attacking opponent upon Multi-zone combat area. - Functional Lootshare & Coinshare. - Funcation Private messaging & Clan chats. - Funcational ::vote command. - Rocktails fishable. - Exp. Counter option. - Double Exp. Weekends! - All Npc's with their correct animations! - Makeable & Functional Overload(4)'s. - Functional Combat resetting commands; ::reset_attack, strength, defense, hitpoints, range, magic & prayer. - Rest just like normal!. - 100% Functional Auto-casting. - Functional Ancient Effigies! - Functional Jad for fire cape!
Miscellaneous Items - Zarosian Armory; Ancient ceremonial, Pernix, Virtus & Torva! - Dragon claws (100% functional Special attack!) - Godswords & All Chaotic weapons and shields. - All Dungeoneering items from novite to primal, including sagittarian & celestial armors. - Ring of rigour, Arcane stream necklace & Gravite weapons. - Staff of Light (100% functional special attack!) - Pvp Armour; Statius, Vesta, Morrigan & Zuriels. - Barrows armor! - Dragon Armour, including (or) & (sp) kits. - Bandos & Armadyl armour. - Up to Dragon & Flameburst Defenders. - Spirit shields with working shield effects! - Korasi sword + Functional Special attack! - Handcannon + Functional Special attack! - Imbued Rings; Berserker ring(i), Archers ring(i), etc. - Elite Void Robes. - Completionist Cape, 5 colors to choose upon & functional emote! - And so much more!
Miscellaneous Npc's & Bosses - Frost Dragons - Nomad - Barrelchests - Nex (Fully Animated) - All perfectly animated & drops a unique item, not too impossible nor too easy.
We shall not stretch this advertisement any longer, by now you're probably fired up to start your conquest on DyNamicPvP, or you want to keep searching for another server which isn't a problem at all, it's either you agree or disagree. But if you really want to judge the server, come join us today and have a look for yourself! You got nothing to lose right?
- VIDEOS -
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NCGJwj5SYNU]Dicing & Staking Vid 2 - Throwin Bils - YouTube[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4JSzTXaH2FA]DyNamic PvP promotional video NEX TORVA PVP - YouTube[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z_S7f7oeGAw]Chef | DynamicPVP | Staking video 1 "Rags to riches" - YouTube[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9bEDADy7Hjo]Urabottymon's first dynamic pvp pk video! - YouTube[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wGjfBBhs2Gk]DyNamic's | PVP | Promo Video - YouTube[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1oXTKyHR_PM]dynamic pvp fun vid - YouTube[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eMXGclV_tkg]O123 Bomb's First Staking Video On DyNamic PvP - YouTube[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pkqot1NpfVg&feature=plcp] PvP video[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uFUHJ0a1yHY&feature=context-cha] Staking video[/url]
- PICTURES -

Here at DyNamicPvP, we strive to become Superior, the Best. Our dedicated programmer(s) spend many hours a day fixing bugs and adding many fresh new contents onto the server to not only improve it and satisfy our fellow players but to improve the job they perform upon DyNamicPvP. We are a non-profit organization, meaning 100% of our donations are Never for personal use. Most servers are created only to make money for personal use or RSGP profits on Runescape, but not here. All donations are stored to pay-off for our powerful dedicated servers and website, and the rest is saved topay for advertisements and upgrade our dedicated servers. Our server has been revamped months ago and we’ve lost nearly all players. As of now, our population’s increasing little by little which is why we’re pleading if you’d please join and help expand our fresh community. As we’re striving, we fully understand they’re a full-load of servers out here, so many to choose from so now the question is; Why would you join DyNamicPvP? What makes DyNamicPvP stand out than other servers?

Current DyNamicPvP Server Features:

  • Excellent Economy & All duping methods has been patched!

  • Godswords & All Chaotic weapons and shields.

  • Dragon Armour, including (or) & (sp) kits.

  • Up to Dragon & Flameburst Defenders.

  • Korasi sword + Functional Special attack!

  • Imbued Rings; Berserker ring(i), Archers ring(i), etc.

We shall not stretch this advertisement any longer, by now you’re probably fired up to start your conquest on DyNamicPvP, or you want to keep searching for another server which isn’t a problem at all, it’s either you agree or disagree. But if you really want to judge the server, come join us today and have a look for yourself! You got nothing to lose right?
